short_summary: Disassemble and provide condition report of Luff/Side travel cylinders for Water Control Dam Log Lifters
description: Parks Canada wants to buy new and refurbished hydraulic cylinders for luffing and side travel applications on water control dam log lifters. The purchase will be made through a procurement procedure, which includes a complete description of the services, delivery conditions and so on. The project is expected to start on November 1st, 2023 and to be completed by March 31st, 2025.

full_summary:
# Disassemble and Provide Condition Report of Luff and Side Travel Cylinders for Water Control Dam Log Lifters

## Contract Details

- **Reference Number**: cb-308-24162556
- **Amendment Number**: 6
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P300-23-0155/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-09-27
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-24T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-10-24
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-31
- **Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada

## Work Summary

The Contracting Entity, Parks Canada Agency (PCA), requires the disassembly and provision of a condition report for the Luff and Side Travel Cylinders of Water Control Dam Log Lifters. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing new and refurbished hydraulic cylinders for the specified applications.

## Procurement Method

- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: The supply contract is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

## Attachment Documents

Please note that all attachment documents are available in both English and French. To access these documents, please visit the Government of Canada tendering service at [Canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

- **Tender Document**: [20773/atlas-polar-7748-luffing-cylinder_bilingual.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20773/atlas-polar-7748-luffing-cylinder_bilingual.pdf)

## Site Visit and Clarification Enquiries

It is recommended that the bidder or a representative visit the work site. A site visit is scheduled to take place on October 10, 2023, at Dam at Lock 22, 3779 Nassau Mills Rd, Peterborough, ON. The site visit will begin at 1:00 PM EDT.

All enquiry of a technical and contractual nature is to be submitted to the Contracting Authority. The deadline for enquiry submission is five (5) calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

## Contact Information

For all tender-related enquiries, please contact Bonnie Knott
